content: > if you would like to help support these > pattern freebies you can buy me a > coffee on **ko-fi** 2 you can also > show your support by letting your > fiber friends know about the pattern > likes comments and shares are always > appreciated **design** featuring my dreamer cable motif 3 this headband is worked holding a strand of bulky weight yarn and a strand of a sequin thread this results in incredible stitch definition with a shimmery glow worked in a unique cable that creates a stretchy fabric allowing it to be worn by a wider range of head sizes pattern is written in one size see below all repeats appear in bold text throughout pattern the pattern is charted and also includes separate written instructions **yarn** yarns shown are **biches & bûches le coton & alpaca** 4 in grey brown 66% gots cotton & 34% super fine alpaca 98 yards/90 m per 50 g /1 76 oz held together with **king cole cosmos** 5 in galactica 76% glitter yarn 24% payette 429 yards/393 m per 25 g/ 88 oz **yardage** note yardage needed does not include a gauge swatch 90 yards/82 meters **needles** us 5 3 75 mm 16 circular needle us 7 4 5 mm 16 circular needle **notions** cable needle stitch marker for bor tapestry needle blocking materials **gauge** cable pattern worked in the round on larger needle blocked 21 stitches & 20 rounds = 4 /10 cm x 4 /10 cm **finished measurements laying flat blocked ** circumference 19 /48 cm height 4 5 /11 cm **techniques used** * working in the round on a circular needle * simple cables explained in pattern * decreasing * reading from a chart or written instructions **pattern difficulty** adventurous beginner 1 https //www ravelry com/stores/whiletheyplay-designs 2 https //ko-fi com/kalurah 3 https //www ravelry com/bundles/dreamer-bundle 4 https //www ravelry com/yarns/library/biches--buches-le-coton--alpaca 5 https //www ravelry com/yarns/library/king-cole-cosmos
